People would be forced out of her way or be bowled over by her humongous appendages. “And wait until they get bigger!”

Anna grabbed a pair of her size 25 saddle shoes and pulled them on, cutting down on the stink her feet generated. That’s when her mother opened the door to her daughter’s room and stepped inside.

“Anna do you smell that foul odor?” she asked before looking down at her daughter’s feet and screamed in shock. “Oh my GOD! Anna! Your FEET!” Anna smiled and shrugged. She knew this was bound to happen, but she wasn’t sure how her mother and father were going to handle this.

Anna sat in the corner of the waiting room of the doctor’s office, her legs crossed and lazily swinging one of her large pendulous feet back and forth. Her mother and the other patients were huddled together in the opposite corner by the door, trying to escape from the smell Anna’s size 25 feet were putting out. Anna didn’t care though, her mother had dragged her here for a “cure,” and right now all she wanted was to be at home unwrapping the multitude of boxes full of new shoes that had arrived for her.

“Anna?” the nurse called, while holding her nose, “The doctor is ready for you now.”

“Whatever,” Anna rolled her eyes as she followed the nurse, her mother trailing behind her. The whole waiting room let out a collective gasp of air, as the door closed behind the big-footed 16-year-old.

Anna’s mother waited nervously outside the examining room, ashamed she couldn’t stomach her daughter’s foot odor enough to be inside, but after what seemed forever, the doctor came out, and hurriedly closed the door behind him. “Is she okay doctor?”

“Honestly,” he began flipping through his charts and notes, “I can’t figure out why her feet are growing so much. We tested her blood, her tissue, took x-rays, and an MRI, and all nothing!”

“So her feet are still going to keep growing…and stinking?” Anna’s mother swallowed nervously.

“I guess? She seems to think she’s going to break a world record, and she assures me then they’ll be done growing, but I have no reason to believe that’ll happen. But at the same time I have no reason to believe that it won’t!”

“So what do I do?”

“Monitor it, and I’ll consult some specialists in the meantime. I don’t think it’s elephantitis, but who knows?”

“Yes, who knows,” Anna’s mother said in a quiet voice.

Just then Anna emerged, an angry look in her eyes, and tapping her enormous foot. The smell from her feet made the doctor and her mother recoil in disgust, “I’m totes ready to go.”

“Then let’s go honey,” her mother said guiding her smelly feet away from her.

Anan drove in silence waiting to get home for her new shoes. She was also anxious to slather her foot growth cream on her feet again, if her parents thought her feet were big before, wait until they see them later! “That’ll totes show them,” she grumbled.

“What did you say dear?” her mother asked with genuine concern.

“Nothing mother.”

“Don’t worry sweetie we’ll solve your foot problem.”

“Mother! I told you before I don’t want it solved!” Her mother just looked at her, feeling the distance between them growing, and this time not because of her daughter’s big stinky feet.

At the house a crowd of reporters was gathered. “What’s going on?” Anna’s mother wondered.

“Ma’am! Ma’am! A word with you and your daughter?” A reporter shouted.

“About what?”

“About the rumors her feet are clown sized and stink like a dump!” another reporter yelled. Anna’s mother’s face became a mask of anger, and she quickly moved the car through the crowd and parked in the garage, ushering her daughter inside.

“Mother! I wanted to talk with them!” Anna whined.

“No! I will not have my daughter displayed as some sort of oddity! Screw them Anna!” Her mother said closing the curtains. Anna frowned and went up stairs, her big black and white saddle shoes stomping loudly as she walked.

She slammed the door to her room, and Anna immediately grabbed the cream from her hiding place. She opened a few boxes of shoes, until she found a pair that would display her feet just the way she wanted them. “Look at he size of these 42’s,” she grinned. “I can’t wait until my feet fit them! And totes stink them up!”

She placed the pair of sweet velvet, colorant match red sole, round toe, with 3-inch high-heels shoes to the side. She then kicked off her saddle shoes, letting the stink that accompanied them to come out unshackled. She squeezed the cream onto both her feet, and began to massage it into her skin.

Anna felt a tingling and put her feet on the floor, she practically orgasmed as they shot across her carpet, tickled by the hairs, as the stretching and widening of her feet began. Her foot odor was stifling, and a slight green haze could be seen wafting from them. She became nervous that they would stop their growth as they neared a size 37, but cried a few tears of joy as they continued on to a size 42. Her calf muscles engorged with new strength until it looked like she had two soft balls stuck to the back of her leg.

She grabbed the sweet velvet, colorant match red sole, round toe shoes and put them on. They fit like they the Gods had tailored them for her. She slowly picked up her foot and began to walk, sending massive shockwaves through the house with each footfall. “Totes awesome! I make my earthquakes!” Anna headed downstairs, her foot odor immediately blanketing the first floor. Her mother threw up from the smell, despite being in another room, and cried. Sure that her daughter had another “growth spurt.” Anna didn’t care though. Not when she had the biggest feet in the world. In history. Man or woman. She threw open her front door, and walked up to the reporters, causing some of them to lose their footing from the seismic waves her feet generated. “Alright! Who wants to interview the girl with biggest and smelliest feet in the whole world?”

A dangerous gleam appeared in Veronica's eye. "Considering that Nelli is my friend, I'd say that it IS my concern." Her eyes narrowed. "Why?"

This conversation was getting into dangerous territory. "Look, something happened earlier with Nelli and I need to talk to her. I don't want to cause her or any of you trouble, I swear. Have you seen her?"

The other girl exhaled. "Yeah, just saw her with Celina. Next hall, third door down on the right."

"Thank you," said Tammy, heading down the hall. She didn't see the smile that came over Veronica's face.

Tammy found Celina and Nelli just where Veronica had said, in the office room behind the third door on the right. What Veronica hadn't said, to Tammy's horror, was what those two were doing in there.
14533222221111111.title: Tammy, the Intermission Part 2

145332222211111111.content:
Opening the door, Tammy was greeted by a jaw-dropping sight; Celina and Nelli had their faces buried into the soles of the other's feet. What's more, the feet looked bigger now than before; easily big enough to cover the girl's faces from chin to forehead. Tammy just stood in the doorway gaping like an idiot. Just what had happened here?

*Ten minutes ago*


Her feet growing at an exponential rate, developing a foot fetish alongside her friends, Celina half carried, half dragged Nelli off the dance floor and out the doors. A task made significantly harder by the cravings that came every time she saw a another girl's feet. In sum, it wasn't one of Celina's better nights.

In an effort to avoid as many people as possible, Celina lead Nelli into an empty office room. "We should be safe here," she said, sitting down on a chair.

Nelli looked at her friend. "So close," she whispered, shivering.

Celina tried to console her. "It' not your fault you tripped and we were out before it got bad. No harm no fowl." she said cheerfully.

"That's not what I mean!" screamed Nelli.

"N-N-Nel?" stammered Celina.

"I was inches away from the most beautiful pair of feet I've ever seen and you drag me away!"

"Nel, for goodness' sake, are you listening to yourself?" shouted Celina. "You're talking about freaking Priscilla's feet! Have you forgotten that she's made it her mission in life to cause you torment. Hell, the only reason she dated Nick was because you liked him for crying out load!"

"That's not important now....I mean, she's not so....someone with such nice feet can't be...." Nelli broke out in tears. "What's happening to me," she wailed.

Celina gave her hug. "Shush, it'll be okay. I'll be okay. We just have to remain strong and fight this." Celina told her.

"I can't," cried Nelli, "I just can't fight it anymore."

"Then don't," said Veronica, suddenly appearing from the hallway.

Celina and Nelli both turned to her.

She just smiled. "Just give in and take a whiff," she said wiggling her toes on the floor. "That's all it takes and all you worries will melt away."

Celina didn't know what was worst; her friend urging them to embrace the infection or how appealing that sounded.

"Please, Celina, let's do it," whispered Nelli, lifting her legs to Celina's face. Unable to resist anymore, Celina mirrored Nelli's motion. Taking a deep breath, they plunged their faces into the other's feet and inhaled. The smell was divine.

Veronica, her work here completed, took her leave.

*Present moment*


It took a few seconds for Celina and Nelli to realize they had company. When they did, all Tammy could say was "May I join you?" In answer, Celina extended her left leg.

Tammy smiled and...

"POP! POP"

As she watched Kristy and Andrea fall under the sway of the foot growth virus, Priscilla recalled her science lesson on what happens when an animal is in danger. When threatened, the nervous system releases hormones, enabling the ability to either fight or flee to safety, known as the fight-or-flight response. Staring down her infected friends and Nelli, she was in that exact circumstance: stay and fight or get the hell out of dodge.

If she stayed, it was obvious she'd end up with huge feet and a foot fetish too boot, no getting out of that, but she might be able to wrestle control of her friends back from Nelli. Who knew, she might even be able to dominate Nelli and her friends as well and possibly the entire female student body. Huge feet seemed a small price for that level of control and Priscilla was greedy enough to consider it.

On the other hand, there was no guarantee she'd win such a struggle and even if she did, she'd be stuck with freakish feet and a foot fetish for who knows how long. In that context, escape and getting immediate medical attention was the more prudent option.

Either way she had to make her choice now; soon they'd finish with Kristy and Andrea and then it would be her turn. Out of time, she weighed her options and decided on...

"Though, you have to admit, she certainly knew when to get going," chuckled Kristy, dangling one of Priscilla's discarded heels by its strap. 1453322222111111111111111112.title: Priscilla's Tale, Part 6: Screw This!

14533222221111111111111111121.content:
The sound of bare feet pounding on a linoleum floor echoed through the hall as Priscilla ran as fast as she could. Having witnessed her best friends succumb to the foot growth virus, Priscilla had fled in terror, running as hard as she could, though whether it was to escape the effects of the foot growth virus or from the guilt of abandoning her friends, no one could say. All she knew was that she had to get away, to someplace safe and away from any foot infected freaks.

So focused on her escape, she failed to notice that someone had spilled water on the floor ahead of her. Normally, this wouldn't have been a problem; however, when you're frantically running away and your gait has changed from your feet suddenly growing, it makes it very easy to slip and fall. That was when she noticed the water.

"AAAAAHHHH!" Twisting her body, Priscilla landed on her side. A felt a jolt of pain got up her left shoulder and stinging in her arm indicated she had a slight brush burn, but she was otherwise unharmed, if a little shaken. Spotting a bench a few feet away, Priscilla dragged herself over to it and sat down.

Arms clasped around her shaking body, Priscilla desperately tried to calm herself down. "Relax, just gotta calm down and relax. It's going to be okay, everything is going to be okay," she told herself. Whether she really believed it was debatable, but it gave her a sense of reassurance nonetheless.

Settling down, Priscilla found herself staring at the top of her feet. She grimaced; her once perfectly sized 7 feet had grown at least a size and a half and judging by what she had seen of Nelli and her friends' feet, it was only the beginning. Not that it would happen to her; unlike the others, she was going to get medical help long before she reached that point. No matter the cost, she would get her dad to pay it.

Still, it bothered her just how much the virus had changed her friends. They'd always been good, normal girls, not freaks like Nelli and her group. Pulling up her leg so that she could get a good look at her sole, she was at a loss to explain just what was they found so appealing about the female foot.

Sure, her own foot was beautiful and sexy, so she could have understood them being obsessed with own her feet, but not each other's and certainly not Nelli's. "I mean," she said, "Nelli's feet are coarse and ugly, while mine are slender works of art, beautiful pieces to be adored and WHAT THE HELL AM I SAYING?!"

Staring at her foot, realization flooded her; she was developing a foot fetish, just like the others. Slowly and unnoticed, the more she had looked at her own foot and unknowingly inhaled her own foot odor, the more she had grown to like it. The only difference was that it was for her own feet instead of someone else's. Disgusted, she tore her face (which had moved only inches away from her foot) back and placed her foot firmly back on the ground. But the damage was done and she was now more rattled than ever.

"It's okay, Priscilla, you can beat this. You'll get through like you always do, just like in that beauty pageant in third grade," she said.

"As I recall, didn't you only win because your daddy bought off the competition?" sneered a familiar voice.

Priscilla's blood ran cold as she realized who was speaking. Standing a yard or two way was Nelli, a lustful look in her eye. Priscilla was trapped like a rat.
14533222221111111111111111121.title: Priscilla's Tale, Part 7: Cornered Rat

145332222211111111111111111211.content:
Had someone told her there would come a time when she would be terrified of Nelli, Priscilla would have laughed in their face. Her, the queen of the school, frightened by a loser like that? The idea was nothing short of hilarious. It didn't seem like much of a laughing matter now, as she shrank back into the bench. Especially when she could barely keep her eyes off of Nelli's huge feet, a sure sign that the infection was strengthening,

Nelli stared down at Priscilla, a triumphant smile on face. "Priscilla, Priscilla, Priscilla, did you honestly think you were gonna get away? Really, even Veronica thought you'd have more sense than that." She shook her head in mock admonishment.

"Ho-how did you find me?" trembled Priscilla.

Nelli indicated to the poor girls feet. "Interesting thing about the foot growth virus; it produces a noticeable and very distinct foot odor in its victims, which can be transferred to other surfaces. Running barefoot like that left traces on the floor that formed a trail I could follow." She added with a purr, "A very pleasurably trail by the way."

Betrayed by her own body, what a way to go she thought. Still, maybe it wasn't over just yet. If Nelli continued taking her sweet time, she could try and make a break for it. As her rival continued gloating, Pricilla sprang up off the bench. Or at least she tried to.

PLOP

Nelli slammed her bare foot into Priscilla's stomach, pushing her back down onto the bench, keeping her pressed down with the force of her left leg.

"Well, I''l give you this, Priscilla, you're a fighter if nothing else," admitted Nelli. "Gotta say, I didn't expect you to fight this hard. None of us did really; Cassandra and Elizabeth thought you you'd give in gracefully."

Her breath a little short from the giant foot pressing down on her lungs, Priscilla managed to croak out, "So, what did Veronica think?" She didn't really care about the answer, but chatting would at least buy her a few more moments.

"Veronica? She thought you'd be on your hands and knees, begging to be let go. Guess, Celina was right; you are to proud to beg."

There went that option. Trying to buy a little more time she asked, "and Maya?"

A strange look came over Nelli's face. "The less said about Maya's...er...opinion, the better. Trust me on this, you don't want to know. You REALLY do not want to know. Now, enough with the jibber jabber, let's get you smelling some feet."

Nelli got situated herself on the bench, keeping Priscilla pinned down, while she took the girls mostly normal feet onto her lap. Any chance Priscilla had of escape was now gone, it was obvious that Nelli had them in an iron grip and was not going to let go anytime soon.

Taking a quick whiff, Nelli said, "Oh ya, I've been waiting a long time for this."

Priscilla raised a eyebrow. "Seriously?" As weird as tonight had been, it seemed too far-fetched that Nelli had been waiting a long time to smell her feet and have Priscilla smell hers.

"Well,more like 45 minutes to 2 hours," she admitted, lifting her size 12 bare feet to Priscilla's face, "but you get the idea."
145332222211111111111111111211.title: Priscilla's Tale, Part 8: No Escape

1453322222111111111111111112111.content:
Priscilla inhaled the scent of Nelli's feet, her face fully covered by the other girl's size 12 soles. At first, she thought they smelled disgusting, but soon found them to be pleasant, which quickly transitioned to pleasurable. Moments ago, Priscilla had found feet gross, now she found them to be sexy. She sat back inhaling the wonderful scent, while Nelli worshiped her feet. This too Priscilla found herself enjoying, especially as her feet grew to a size 10 1/2 as Nelli licked them.

Watching Priscilla succumb to the virus, with a pair of simply marvelous feet at her disposal, was incredible arousing to Nelli. It was strange how two people who had hated each other for years could be brought so close together, all thanks to the wonder of bare feet. Wanting to increase the pleasure, Nelli decided she wanted Priscilla to not only smell her feet, but lick and worship them. Not only would it be hot, it would be so satisfying to watch a stuck up like Priscilla doing it.

"Hey, Priscilla, my feet are in need of a good licking, why don't you give it to them."

"Sure, Nel," Priscilla said enthusiastically, though the use of the pet name "Nel" surprised Nelli; clearly the virus was having a profound affect. Indeed, that was evident from the way Priscilla worshiped her feet, licking her soles over and over, lathering them with her tongue. It was amazing.

"OH YA! Man Priscilla, you were born to lick feet," said Nelli.

"Thank *lick* you *lick* Nelli! Oh, I *lick* love *lick* you're *lick* sexy *lick* feet." Priscilla was truly one of them now, no question of that. She just couldn't get enough of her rivals feet. Not that it bothered Nelli a bit. She was perfectly happy having her feet licked while she licked Priscilla's. Two girls laid on the bench, each completely obsessed with the other's feet. And they were making quite a scene of it too.
1453322222111111111111111112111.title: Priscilla's Tale, Part 9: Sexy Feet

choices: Veronica and co. sneak up on Susan
14533222221111111111111111121112.content:
The two girls were really getting into each other's feet, the sounds of them licking and kissing could be heard down the hall. Which, considering the ruckus they were making, was attracting a fair amount of attention.

"OMG!"

*5 minutes earlier*

"You're jealous, ipso facto, your argument is invalid," asserted Missy, in response to her friend Susan's comment about her hair.

Susan rolled her eyes. "One," she held up a finger, "I'm not jealous and two," she held up a second finger, "even if I was (which I'm not) beehives went out of style in the 70's."

"If you weren't jealous you wouldn't feel a need to deny it," argued Missy, completely ignoring her friend's point. "Besides, Jerry said I looked gorgeous."

"Pfft, he'd say you looked good wearing a trashcan with a banana peel on your head."

"And it would be so true....ah, here we are. I'll just be a min, Sue."

Not likely, though Susan as her friend dashed into the bathroom. Still, she stood outside while her friend relieved herself. To pass the time, she looked at some of the pictures she had snapped with her phone that night. She was chuckling at the sight of one of them when she heard moans from down the hall. For a moment, she though that someone was hurt, but quickly recognized that those were moans of pleasure, not pain. Curious, she headed down to the hallway towards the source of the sounds and was bewildered by what she saw.


"OMG!"

Not the most original thing to say, but then Susan had no idea how to respond to what lay before her. There, lying on a bench were two girls, who appeared to be making out with the other's feet. It took a her a moment to recognize the two prone bodies.

"Nelli?! Priscilla?!," she whispered, shocked. Seeing two girls who absolutely hated each other in such and intimate and kinky way had only two explanations. Either she was dreaming or the world had gone mad.
14533222221111111111111111121112.title: Bewildering Sight

145332222211111111111111111211121.content:
Susan was not the only one wondering what was going on; a few more girls had come to investigate. One of whom had whipped out her cellphone to take a quick pic of the scene. Priscilla and Nelli were either oblivious to the attention they were gathering simply didn't care.

"Um, should we, you know, do something?" asked one of the girls, a brunette named Alice. Another girl, Darcy, nodded in agreement.

"Are you nuts?" said Molly, the one who had taken the picture. "This is going straight to Facebook." she said, taking another picture.

"Hey, peanut gallery, ya mind keeping down?" shouted Priscilla, tearing her mouth away from Nelli's feet.

"Ya, we're a little busy at the moment," added Nelli.

An eerie silence fell over the four girls. It was one thing to watch two people engage in foot worship, but a whole other can of worms to actually talk to them about it. None of them knew what to say, thought Darcy managed to squeak out a small "Sorry," before her face got bright red.

It was finally Susan who decided to say something, just has Nelli was sucking the middle toe of Priscilla's left foot. "Uh, you two do know that you can't, you know, do this here right?"

"Mmhm," agreed Alice. "It's just wrong."

"It made be wrong," admitted Priscilla, "but it's damn fun." Moving into a better position, Priscillia looked at the four girls in front of her and smiled. She had a plan.

"In fact, maybe you should all give it a shot," she said, maneuvering her large feet from their position on Nelli's face, to right in front of the four stunned girls. Nell, seeing what Priscilla had in mind, turned so that her feet were next to Priscilla's, doubling the number of soles and the foot odor headed their way.

"Pee-yew! Oh man, they stink," said Molly, her hand clamped over nose, the other three doing likewise. Priscilla shook her head at their reaction.

"Don't be like that, Molly. Go on and take your hand off your nose and give our feet a big whiff. You won't regret it, I promise."

"Trust me," added Nelli, "they smell really good and taste even better." She wiggled her toes, as did Priscilla.

Mesmerized by Nelli's wiggling toes, one of the girls move towards Nelli's feet. It wasn't until she was inches from the sole that Susan realized it was her. "What I am doing?" she thought. "I don't like feet or anything." Yet the more she stared at the sole, the more beautiful it looked, with the high arch and wrinkles that Susan took a sniff of the foot odor, sealing her fate.

"Good girl, Susan," said Nelli, as the virus went to work, causing Susan's feet to explode out of her shoes. "Pop! Pop!"

"EEK!" shouted Molly and Darcy, grabbing hold of the other in a moment of fright. Their nostrils no longer protected, Priscilla quickly shimmied up and placed her feet on their faces. Before either of them knew had happened, the virus was already coursing through their systems, causing their feet to grow as well.

Alice just stared at the other three for a moment, before shrugging her shoulders. To everyone's surprise, she kicked off her shoes and lifted Molly's foot off the ground and took a big whiff....

* * *

"There you are Sue," shouted Missy. "Where were you, I've been looking for you for the past five minutes." Noticing that Susan was barefoot, as were the other five girls, Missy wondered just what was up.

"Hey, Sue, what happened over her?" she asked, pointing to the lack of footwear to be found.

"You'll find out soon enough," responded Susan. Taking their cue, Molly and Darcy grabbed her and pushed her to the floor, while Alice quickly slipped Missy's shoes off her feet.

"WHAT THE HELL!" Screamed Missy, as Susan placed her right foot over her friend's face. To her amazement, she found herself examining Sue's foot, which she found was really big. She wondered, had Sue always had such big feet and had they always smelled this good?
145332222211111111111111111211121.title: Can of Worms

choices: Go with Darcy's plan and spread the infection
1453322222111111111111111112111211.content:
"I can't leave you alone for a minute," said Veronica, exasperated by Nelli's antics. After Priscilla had run off and Nelli had given chase, Veronica had taken charge of the newly converted girls. She'd expected Nelli to return shortly with a fully infect Priscilla. Instead, she'd been left hanging for over a quarter of an hour, while Nelli kept Priscilla's feet all for herself. That would have been bad enough, but what really got her was that they were seen while foot worshiping.

It was quite a sight when Veronica and the others had caught up to find Missy smelling Susan's feet, with Alice licking hers while Nelli, Priscilla, Molly and Darcy were licking each others.

"Oh lighten up," said Andrea, taking a go Molly's foot. "Counting Priscilla, Nelli brought five more girls into the fold. Cut her some slack."

Priscilla was indignant. "I'll have you know, Andrea, that it was my idea to infect them and that I personally turned Darcy and Molly!"

"Yeah, that was all you," said Nelli, giving her an affectionate hug.

That earned her a few raised eyebrows from Maya, Cassandra, and Elizabeth. Probably would have got one from Celina too, had she not preoccupied with sucking Susan's toes. The strange gesture didn't escape Tammy either, nor the seriousness of their current predicament.

"While its touching (and creepy) that you two are getting along so well now, maybe we should move to some place more private before someone else comes along." Never let it be said that Tammy couldn't see the bigger picture.

"Let them come," said Darcy, rubbing her now size 11 1/2 feet. "One whiff of our feet is all it takes for them to become one of us."

"Not if its a boy; we can't infect guys," pointed out Kristy.

"Actually, that's not entirely true," corrected Maya.

"What do you mean?" asked Cassandra.

Maya explained. "The foot growth virus attacks the X chromosome. Girls, like us, have two X chromosomes, so we get the full package. Males do have an X chromosome, but since they only have one, so they are only partially infected, unlike us."

" 'Partially infected,' how's that worked?" asked Roxanne.

Maya continued from where she left off. "They only receive the weakest of the symptoms, the foot fetish. Otherwise, they're unaffected."

"And you know all this how?" asked Tammy.

"She watched a news report. A very in-depth news report apparently," answered Elizabeth.

"Fantastic, we're all up to speed on the virus. Can we now please infect some more people with it?" asked Darcy. "You guys have had hours to enjoy fee, but me, Molly, Sue, Missy, and Alice have barely gotten a trifle. I say infect as many as we can." Her statement earned her a cheer from Alice and Susan.

Tammy shook head. "Bad idea. We're lucky we haven't been found out as it is, but the more people we add, the harder it is to remain unnoticed."

"What are you thinking, Tam?" asked Priscilla.

Her friend looked at the other girls. "That we we should get out of here while we still can. If someone finds out about the foot growth virus and they alert the authorities.....we'll use you imaginations," she said.

The girls....
1453322222111111111111111112111211.title: All together

14533222221111111111111111121112111.content:
"So, we could go back to the dance floor and infect as many girls as we can, have access to their feet, but at the cost of exposing ourselves," said Veronica. "On the other hand, we could take the safe option and get while the getting's good. The question is, which should we pick?"

"I say we take a few moments to discuss the matter and then vote on it," cut in Priscilla, to Veronica's annoyance and everyone else's approval. She'd just been about to suggest the same thing, but Priscilla had beaten her to the punch. Fuming, she motioned for whoever wanted to speak to do so.

Immediately, Alice's hand shot up. Veronica gave her the go ahead.

"I agree with Darcy; we've got almost the entire female senior class right here waiting to smell our feet. We're never gonna get a better chance than this."

"And afterwards, we can all get shoved into a quarantine zone until a cure is found," interjected Cassandra. "Face it, someone's gonna notice us publicly converting people. That's gonna attract attention pretty quick."

"Especially considering that they're gonna be alert after putting out that news report," added Tammy.

There's was an outbreak of chatter in response to Tammy and Cassandra's remarks. Those most strongly against were the recent batch of converts lead Darcy and Alice, though Maya, Kristy, and Julie were also in agreement. In contrast, other than Veronica, only Andrea and Elizabeth were showing any vocal support for the leave position. That made it 8 to 5 against leaving.

That worried Veronica. Sure, she would love to spread the virus to the rest of the senior class, but like Tammy, she'd foreseen the danger in that path. It was safer to leave, but with 8 against that, it'd take just one more vote and they'd be marching right onto the dance floor.

Fortunately for Veronica, Tammy's words had had an effect on her Priscilla and Roxanne; both of them stood up in support of leaving. The vote was now 8 to 7. It all depended on what Nelli and Celina decided. As it turned out, today was Veronica's lucky day.

"Um," started Nelli, "look, I like feet, a lot. More than like, love em really, and I....ah....don't wanna lose that love. Like, at all. If we go marching on to the dance floor, forcing our feet on other girls, we'll have probably the best night of our lives. But it'll be one single night. That's not enough for me, I want months, if not years of feet. Currently, there are maybe several dozen girls out on the dance floor right now. In the real world, there are so many more. We'll have other chances and all the feet we could ever want we're patient, so I vote we leave."

Veronica could have kissed her; not only had Nelli's words swayed Celina, they'd convinced Susan and Maya to change their vote. Thus the final vote was 11 favor of leaving with 6 against. Now all they had to do was get out.
14533222221111111111111111121112111.title: Democracy

145332222211111111111111111211121111.content:
With the vote firmly in favor of getting the hell out of dodge, the 17 girls made their way towards the exit. It was slow going, partially because they'd practically had to drag Darcy with them, but also because one of their number was lagging behind.

"Yo, Priscilla, hurry up slow poke," urged Roxanne.

But Priscilla was deep in thought, (which contrary to Veronica's opinion, was something she did regularly) and did not immediately realize that Roxanne was talking to her.

"Earth to Priscilla, can you read me?" asked Roxanne, irritated at being held. This time, she gave her friend a shove to get her attention. It was effective.

"Ow!" said Priscilla as she hit the wall. "What was that for?"

Roxanne clapped her palms in mock prayer. "She speaks, it's a miracle." Andrea, on the other hand, decided to actually answer the question.

"You zoned out and were slowing us down. That was Roxanne's....'direct' method of getting your attention."

"Oh, sorry," said Priscilla. "Guess I got to caught up in my thoughts."

"Wow," said Veronica, who couldn't let this one pass, "this day has been full of surprises." That got a chuckle from Celina, Elizabeth, and Cassandra, but Nelli, stamped Veronica's foot instead.

"What were you think about?" asked Susan, as Veronica hopped around in pain.

"Well, I've always thought that prom would be the best night of my life," began Priscilla. "Dancing, boys, gorgeous dresses, showing my classmates how superior I am." That last one may have been a joke, though Maya felt the need to make the crazy hand gesture.

"But instead," interjected Alice, "you got big feet, a foot fetish, and a bunch of girls in the same condition." Priscilla nodded her head.

"That's just it. I didn't know it at first, but in a way, this has been the best night of my life. I was reflecting on how ironic it was that something I was fearing quickly became the best thing to happen to me." That got them all thinking.

"Yeah, now that you mention it, none of us would have have willingly wanted this to happen, but now that it has, I love it," said Veronica.

"Seconded," said Tammy.

"Ditto," responded Molly and Susan, while the rest responded with "mhmm" or something to that extent. All except one.

"Uh, actually I have a bit of a confession," said Alice, getting everyone's complete attention. "I....um....kind of....uh....already had a foot fetish before I was infected."

The where a collective "WHAT!" followed by a "no way" from Susan.

"Yeah, it's actually why I joined the swim team; plenty of barefoot girls."

"Wait," said Nelli, "then why did you say 'it's just wrong' when you found me and Priscilla?"

"I've been hiding my fetish for years; after a while, it becomes seconded nature to distance yourself from it."

"Oh, sorry."

"No problem."

"As touching as this is, I think it be best if we continued moving," said Veronica. Taking heed, the girls continued on.

Soon they arrived at the buildings exit. While Celina, Tammy, and Alice went to fetch their cars (the rest would be have to be picked up later) the remaining girls debated on where to go. As she had the biggest house, Priscilla recommended they go there, but Missy insisted they go there, but Missy felt they should go to the hotel where the after party was to be held.

In the end they decided on....
145332222211111111111111111211121111.title: In the dead of night

1453322222111111111111111112111211111.content:
"Mine's bigger." That was Priscilla's argument for why they should go to her house. In the end, it proved to be enough to convince them. However, as the cars pulled up, they all saw that Priscilla had lied. Her house wasn't big, it was HUGE. Not quite a mansion, but still pretty big nonetheless.

They'd all known that Priscilla's family was loaded, but none of them (not even her friends) had realized just how much until now.

"Priscilla, just what do your parents do again?" asked Andrea.

Priscilla's response: "Heh, please." They got nothing more out of her.

At the door, Priscilla knocked three times. In short order, the door opened revealing a petite woman in a maid's outfit. "Miss Priscilla, my goodness, I did not expect you to be home so soon. Did you have a good time?"

"It was interesting to say the least, Charlotte," she told the maid. "Are my parents in by any chance?"

"No, they went away for the night and won't be back till tomorrow afternoon," answered the maid.

"Perfect, then we'll have the house to ourselves." Priscilla marched through the front door, followed by the other girls, right past the stunned maid.

Flummoxed, Charlotte asked, "Um, Miss Priscilla, who all these people. And I know it's not my place to ask but why are you so early?"

Flopping down into a nearby chair, Priscilla addressed Charlotte. "Things got a little 'weird' tonight, but that can wait. First of all, I need you to get a bucket full of water, some soap, and a couple of towels." She raised her right foot into the air, the sole covered in a thin layer of dirt. "Our feet need a good cleaning."

Now that it had been pointed out to her, Charlotte saw that all seventeen girls were barefoot. "What happened to your designer shoes, Miss Priscilla?"

"Not important. What is important is that you need to wash our feet. Get to it!" barked Priscilla.

Charlotte's mood shifted from confusion to indignation. When she had taken this job, her responsibilities had been quite clear: make the beds, wash the dishes, vacuum and dust, and do the laundry. If Priscilla though she was going to do something else, especially something so degrading she had another thing coming-

"Of course, I'll generously compensate you for your hard work," said Priscilla.

-on the other hand, going above and beyond your responsibilities was the sign a dedicated employee. With that in mind, Charlotte went to fetch a wash bin. While she was busy with her duties, the girls exchanged knowing looks. Five minutes later, Charlotte returned with a wash bin filled halfway with water, plus the soap and towels.

Placing the items in front of her employers' daughter, she began to clean the girl's feet. She had to admit, Priscilla's feet really needed a thorough cleaning; they smelled horrible. She'd better pay damn well me well for this, she thought to herself. Thankfully, it didn't take long.

Priscilla admired her now clean feet. "Wow, nice job Charlotte. I should have you wash my feet more often."

"Tha-thank you, Miss," said Charlotte, thinking that hell would sooner freeze over, though decorum demanded she refrain from saying that. That got her thinking. "Um, Miss Priscilla, you said something earlier about compensation and I was just wondering how much-"

"Of course. Here, let me give you your compensation" said Priscilla, sticking her bare feet onto Charlotte's face.
1453322222111111111111111112111211111.title: Priscilla's house

14533222221111111111111111121112111111.content:
As her feet were being cleaned, Priscilla studied Charlotte. The maid was about 25, with short, chestnut hair, and with a rather small stature. Other than that, she didn't know too much about Charlotte.

As Charlotte finished, Priscilla examined her feet. "Wow, nice job Charlotte. I should have you wash my feet more often."

"Tha-thank you, Miss," said Charlotte. If her face was anything to go by, Charlotte was clearly disgusted with her recent task. Well that would change soon, thought Priscilla.

"Um, Miss Priscilla, you said something earlier about compensation and I was just wondering how much-"

Well, if that wasn't the perfect moment nothing was. Smiling, Priscilla said, "Of course. Here, let me give you your compensation" and placed her bare feet right on Charlotte's face. It had come so suddenly that the feet were covering her face before she knew what had happened.

To say that Charlotte was uncomfortable with this turn of events would be an understatement. To say that she was not royally pissed would be a downright lie. It took every bit of self-control and decorum to keep her from screaming at Priscilla. Those feet had smelled horrible when she'd been washing them, but right in her face they were intolerable. Her body flinched every time she got a whiff of foot odor.

Certain that the virus was now circulating in the Charlotte's system, Priscilla removed her feet and smiled. "So, Charlotte, how did you like your compensation?"

"It was....uh....not what I had in mind," answered the maid through gritted teeth.

The smile faded, quickly replaced by a frown. Despite inhaling the infectious foot odor, Charlotte was not displaying any symptoms. Every other girl who'd been directly exposed like that immediately had her feet grow and a fetish emerge. Maybe having her feet washed had diluted the infectious nature of the odor. Or, maybe Charlotte was naturally resistant, in which case they were going to need to play their cards close to the vest.

Feigning abashment, Priscilla said, "Sorry, that was supposed to be a joke. Guess it was rather in bad taste."

"I wouldn't say that, Miss," replied Charlotte. What she would say would probably get her fired and blacklisted.

"Still, you were promised compensation and it was wrong of me to tease you like that," said Priscilla, pulling her checkbook from her purse. Quickly, she wrote a check hand handed it to the maid. "Here."

Charlotte's eyes nearly bulged out of their sockets. That check was worth a decent amount of money; more than she'd typically earn in a day, which was hardly a paltry sum to begin with.

"This is very generous of you, Miss."

"Think nothing of," said Priscilla getting up. "Oh, and there will be a bonus once you finish with my friends." The money she had just been and the promise of more pushed any thoughts of rage or indignation aside. If Priscilla was willing to pay this much, Charlotte could stomach a little degradation.

Julie moved to take Priscilla's place and put her feet right in front of Charlotte. Sighing at having to wash 16 more pairs of feet, but thinking of the money, Charlotte began cleaning. Hopefully, she'd finish up quickly as her own feet were starting to her hurt, as if they were in shoes that were too small.
14533222221111111111111111121112111111.title: Charlotte is slowly infected

choices: Charlotte's feet explode out of her shoes
145332222211111111111111111211121111111.content:
Charlotte was on her eighth pair of feet now. Regardless of how unpleasant a task foot washing was, Charlotte was grateful that at least it didn't take long. Another five to ten minutes till she was done and as far as she was concerned, not a moment too soon. Funnily, as she had cleaned the other girls', her own feet had started to hurt, as if her shoes were too small.

As the maid finished up with Kristy and moved on to Molly, Priscilla pulled Maya aside. "Why haven't her feet grown yet?" asked Priscilla in a hushed whisper. "She got a face full of my foot odor, not to mention the others. Why isn't it working!"

"I don't know," responded Maya. "Maybe washing weakens the odor or something."

"Or maybe Charlotte is naturally resistant," said Alice, who had quietly joined the conversation.

"For all our sakes, let's hope not," said Priscilla.

While the had been speaking, Charlotte had finished with Molly and started on Elizabeth. Shortly afterwards, Elizabeth's feet were clean and Charlotte called for the next girl. It was then that Alice saw that Charlotte seemed to be in some kind of discomfort. It was when Charlotte rubbed her ankles that she identified the cause; Charlotte's feet were growing. Albeit slowly, but hey, it was progress.

Soon, Charlotte finished washing the last pair of feet. A good thing too as her feet were really starting to hurt now. Deciding to get her money and go, Charlotte stood up.

Then....
145332222211111111111111111211121111111.title: Not a moment to soon...

choices: Charlotte's feet go through a growth spurt
1453322222111111111111111112111211111111.content:
*RRRRIIIIIIIIIIPPPPP*

"The Hell!" screamed Charlotte. As she'd gotten up, the backs of her shoes had torn. Flopping down on the nearest chair, Charlotte ripped her right shoe off to look at it. She cursed as she saw that it was halfway torn down the heel. Her left was in the same condition.

"How did this happen?" asked Priscilla (as if she didn't know), who had walked over to see the damage.

"The Hell should I know," screamed Charlotte, who then remembered who she was talking too, "ma'am."

"Maybe you've just been on your feet too much. We work you too hard don't we, Charlotte," said Priscilla. "You clearly need a break."

That was new. While Charlotte wouldn't disagree that she was over worked and underplayed (she was neither), she would never have expected Priscilla to admit it. Normally, she acted like the whole world revolved around her and you were lucky if she deigned to look in you direction. Charlotte didn't know how to reply to this unexpected compassion. Nor did she get the chance to.

"You just sit down and take a load off, you've earned it," said Priscilla, sitting down right in front of Charlotte's feet.

"Uh, miss, what are you doing?"

"Well," said Charlotte as she took off Charlotte's left foot, "you took care of my feet," she took off the maid's nylon stockings and began massaging Charlotte's feet, "I thought it was only fair to return the favor." This only added to the weirdness of tonight, but if Priscilla wanted to massage her feet, Charlotte was not going to object.

1453322222111111111111111112111211111111.content:
It was early in the morning. Carol Upper was watching the news, a half filled cup of steaming hot coffee in her hand, when someone knocked on her door. "Who could that be?" she wondered. Setting her cup down, she went to answer the door, muting the TV behind her. Had she left the volume on or waited 20 more seconds more before answering, she would have heard the emergency broadcast about the outbreak at a local High School prom just last night. One with surprising effects on women.

Well, as it turned out, Carol was in for a surprise anyway. Standing out on her front door was her neighbors' daughter, Nelli, wearing a dirty prom dress, her hair a mess, and barefoot, a pair of broken shoes held in her right hand. Clare immediately unlocked and opened the door.

"Nelli, my gosh, are you alright?" she asked.

"I'm fine, Ms. Upper." Glancing down at her disheveled appearance, added, "just had a wild night at prom."

"I can see that," replied Carol, looking at what she hoped were punch stains (as a matter of fact, they were). "But, you're....er....alright, I mean...." Seeing the worried tone in Carol's face, Nelli hastened to reassure her.

"Oh, no, nothings wrong. I just, well....kind of have lost my key and my parents are out till this afternoon, so I was wondering-"

"Of course, let me go get it," said Carol before Nelli could finish. Nelli's parents were good friends of Carol's and they had exchanged key with each other for just such occasions. "Please, come in while I dig up that key. Now where did I put it?" said Carol dashing up the stairs.

Smiling, Nelli entered the house. Focused on finding the key, Carol didn't hear Nelli shut and lock the door behind her. Nor did she she hear the girl follow her up the stairs. Kneeling on the floor, oblivious to everything else, Carol rummaged through the bottom drawer till she found the key.

"Ah ha, found the little bugger," she said triumphantly.

"Good," answered Nelli from behind her. Surprised that Nelli was behind her, Carol turned her head to look back, smack dab into Nelli's bare foot. The first thing she noticed was that the foot was a little dirty and smelly, the second was that she liked the smell, and the third was that there was a strange feeling in her feet.

(A few hours later)

"Oh yes, YES!," screamed Shauna as Carol worshiped her ebony feet.

"I'd new you'd three would love this," laughed Carol as her own feet were sucked by her friends Stacy and Liz. The three women had shown up at Carol's for their weekly book club meeting as they had for the past six months. It just so happened to coincide with Carol being infected with the foot growth virus earlier that day. When the trio had shown up, Carol welcomed them in, then second they were relaxed and sitting down, Carol ripped off the overly large sweat-socks she'd been wearing and pushed her bare, size 14 feet in the faces of Stacy and Liz. Shauna, thinking that this was some stupid joke, didn't react until Carol stuffed both her feet into her face. Then, all of them infected and their feet growing to an equivalent size, they began to worship each other's feet.

Carol was really getting into having a foot fetish, all thanks to Nelli for infecting her. The next time she saw that girls she'd defiantly have to pay her back. Shame she hadn't wanted to stick around for this, though. Unbeknownst to Carol, however, was that she was just one small part in a master plan set out by Veronica.

The previous night, after they had decided to take a break from the foot orgy, the girls had discussed what to do next. Most of them were content to just continue as they had; worshiping feet and adding more girls to the mix as they went along. The problem with that, as Tammy had once more pointed out, was that sooner or later they were going to be discovered. At which point, they'd be quarantined until a treatment was found

The bickering ended when Veronica put her foot down (literally). With clear, cool logic, Veronica explained that while yes, they would in deed be found out at some point, there was no reason to be stupid about it. Instead, she proposed a compromise. First, the girls would try to maintain a low profile for as long as possible. Second, they would try to covertly spread the virus as far and wide as they could, rendering any attempt at containment impossible. Agreeing to the plan, girls began making preparations. Over the next few days, the girls infected as many people as they could. Starting with family members, neighbors like Carol, and close friends, all of whom would help spread the virus even further.

(Four months later)

Dr. Jenna Byron examined the report that lay before her, the worry lines on her face growing worse the more she read.

"Anything good there?" asked her colleague, Dr. Keira Cuttings, handing her a cup of coffee.

Dr. Byron took the cup. "Plenty, but I wouldn't call any of it good."

"Bad?"

"Worse." The current report merely confirmed what everyone had already known for months; the foot growth virus was spreading at an alarming rate. Initially, the virus had been believed to be mostly benign as it didn't make people sick or spread in very easy way, so it had been a low priority for the CDC. That is until they realized that the virus caused a foot fetish which drove infected women to spread it. By the time the CDC finally mobilized, it was too late; the initial hot-zone was overrun with those infected by the virus. Though the government was able to close off the area as a whole, they were unable to stop people from being infected within that area. Even worse, several carriers had gotten out before the quarantine went up, among them were the some of the first infected (notably Cassandra, Elizabeth, Susan, Missy, Andrea and Roxanne). Soon, outbreaks of the foot growth virus began appearing all over the state, and soon after the country as a whole. It was only a matter of time until it spread farther.

The only bright spot was that there was no shortage of samples to study, not that there had been much luck in finding any effective treatment, and that men weren't contagious if infected, though more than willing to help infect. So much for looking on the bright side, thought Dr. Byron ruefully taking a sip of her coffee.

"Uh, odd," she murmured.

"What?" asked Dr. Keira Cuttings taking a sip of her own coffee, dangling her right shoe off her toes.

"The coffee tastes a little strange, we change brands or something?" asked Jenna.

"Not as far as I know," answered Keira, taking another sip, noticing the same strange taste. The two women returned to examining the report, periodically taking sips of coffee. As the morning wore on, both Keira and Jenna found it more comfortable to remove their shoes and work barefoot. Soon after, they began to playfully tease each other with their feet. It was when they started playing footsie that they realized the ghastly truth.

"Holy crap, Jenna, we're infected!" shouted Keira. It was the only logical explanation.

Jenna nodded, having made the same deduction as Keira had. "But how?" She stared at her empty coffee mug, comprehension dawning. "It's the coffee! Remember the strange taste, it must be contaminated."

"But if that's true...." horror dawned on Keira's face. She didn't need to finish her statement, it was plain that if the coffee was contaminated with the virus, the whole facility was compromised.

"We have sound the alarm," said Keira. The two women ran out of the room, not even bothering to put their shoes back on. There bare feet pounded on the floor as their mad dash to warn their co-workers began. They needn't have bothered; everyone was already infected and soon, the full symptoms began to appear. Not only in this facility, but in similar ones across the country, as well as the common household. Not long afterwards, the entire country fell under the virus. It was merely the first to succumb.

(Twenty years later)

Newly elected President Nelli McConnell, feet completely bare, stared out at the assembled crowd. All here for her inauguration.

"What was I thinking, running for president?"

"The same thing as always, dear," answered her wife, Priscilla, feet as equally bare.

"So nothing then," said Vice President Veronica Hart with a chuckle, also barefoot. Over the years, Veronica and Nelli had become two of the most prominent faces in American life; the women who had helped lead the country to a new, foot fetish, era. It was only natural that they would become leaders of this generation.

"Just speak from the heart and you'll be fine," assured Nelli and Priscilla's husband, Nick, as barefoot as the three women around him.

"Okay, I'm ready," she told them. And with that she approached the podium to give her speech.

"My friends, fellow Americans, and distinguished guests, today we stand at the culmination of nearly twenty years of hard labor. Labor undertaken so that all men and women would be able to indulge the liberty of foot fetishism....

Years later, students would study the inauguration speech of President Nelli McConnell as what historians would call the end of the Foot Fetish Revolution.

1453322222111111111111111112111211111111.content:
The first ray of light crept over the house as what had been the most eventful night in these eighteen girls' lives came to a close. As the morning sun pored in, Susan was the first to awaken. Yawning, she stretched and looked at once been the living room of Priscilla's house. It was a jarring site.

Chairs knocked down, tables thrown against the wall, at least one hole in the wall, pieces of clothing and half eaten food scattered over the floor. Not to mention a couple of stains dotting the carpet, of which was better left unsaid. The living room was a pretty good example of what happened to a house after a foot fetish induced orgy. In short, the place was a mess and Susan had no idea how it had gotten like this. The last thing she remembered was Charlotte being infected and all the girls pairing off. Afterwards, she had some hazy memories but otherwise was it was all a blank.

She tiptoed out of the room, curious if the rest of the house looked this bad. It did. Mostly do to the odd position some of the other girls were in: Roxanne was laying face down on the dining room table, Kristy and Darcy were on the couch with the other's feet in their face, Julie and Maya were cuddling together, and Missy was sitting in a chair. Normally that wouldn't have been strange except that the chairs back was on the floor, meaning that Missy was sitting upside down.

"We are so dead," whispered Susan, padding softly up the stairs in search of the remaining girls. She found Veronica laying on the landing, an empty bottle and ice cream box nearby. Cassandra and Elizabeth were laying together in a tub and Tammy was wrapped in a bunch of towels in the hall. As she reached the end of the hallway, the last door on the right opened and Priscilla stepped out, followed by Nelli.

"Morning Sue," said Nelli, yawning. "Did you have fun last night?"

"I had fun, as did everybody us. Not sure about the house though," said Susan.

Priscilla's eyes narrowed. "What do you mean 'not sure about the house?'"

"Have you two been downstairs at all?"

It was Nelli who answered. "Not since we came up here with Veronica and Tammy." She saw Tammy lying in the hall. "Well that explains where she got off too."

"Back to the topic about my house," interjected Priscilla.

"Brace yourself girl," warned Susan as she showed them the disaster area of what had once been Priscilla's living room. To Priscilla's credit, she didn't scream. To Nell and Susan's credit, they had the good sense to clamp down her mouth before she could.
1453322222111111111111111112111211111111.title: After Night

"Gulp....gulp....gulp," Priscilla chugged down her drink like it was the last one she was ever going to have. Considering the state of her house, that seemed a very distinct possibility.

Holding the empty wine bottle, Susan asked, "feel better?" It had taken everything her and Nelli had been able to muster to keep her from screaming at the top of her lungs. When that had failed, Susan grabbed a mostly empty bottle of wine, poured a glass for Priscilla, and then downed the rest herself. They were going to need a lot more wine.

"Yeah, I'm cool," said Priscilla.

"So what are we gonna do?" asked Nelli, taking the bottle from Susan. "Aw, it's empty," she added, referring to the bottle.

* * *

Thankfully, they mistakenly traced the source of the outbreak to the hotel where the after prom was to be held. Thus their little group was not checked for infection and remained safety hidden. To keep it that way, Veronica (who had become their de facto leader) decided that it would be best if they stayed discreet with their collective foot fetish until concern of the virus had died down and then it would be time to spread the virus once more.

That time was fast approaching. No new reports of outbreaks had occurred in six weeks; they had agreed to wait two months of no reported outbreaks before they started to recruit again. So in preparation, they had all moved on with their lives and prepared for college life. Most of them where here at Heartfirst, but not everyone had gotten in. Now they were just waiting for Veronica to give the go ahead.

In the meantime, Nelli had enjoyed the college experience so far. The classes were difficult, but she loved a challenge and the people were really cool. Not to mention, the parties were fun. "Look, I get how anxious Priscilla is for fresh feet, we all are, but it's not a good time. Until the CDC stops putting out warnings, it's too risky at the moment. Just wait a few more weeks, another month tops and then I promise you. K?" asked Veronica.

Nelli made a grab for Priscilla's phone, but Roxanne beat her to it and knocked out of her hand with her foot. "You all promised," said Priscilla shooting accusing looks at her three friends.

Nelli, Celina, Elizabeth, and Cassandra watched Maya smell Veronica's foot, feeling a mixture of disgust and envy. "We need to get out of here, now," said Celina. "Before we end up like Maya or anyone else gets infected."

"Do we have to? I mean, come on, so our feet stink, they're growing bigger, and we're all developing a liking for feet, but is it really that bad they we have to leave? This is prom after all." Veronica's question earned her were "What are you, crazy?" looks from her friends.

"Seriously, Veronica, do you want to end up like Maya?" Seeing the dangerous look in Celina's eye, Veronica wisely decided to back down. Though in all honestly, she didn't think she mind having a foot fetish. Maya certainly seemed to be enjoying it.

The six friends got up from the table and discreetly left the room. In spite of the seriousness of the situation, Nelli couldn't help but feel a pang of sadness as she watched Nick dance with Priscilla. Why did this have to happen on tonight of all nights? As they headed to the parking lot, Elizabeth asked Celina "So what's the plan?"

Celina grunted. "Get to my car and drive far away."

"Where to?" asked Veronica.

"A hospital, where else? Hopefully they'll have a cure or at least a treatment." Celina shrugged. "It's a long shot, but better than nothing, right?"

"Carriers of a highly infectious disease going to a place full of sick people." Cassandra gave her a double thumbs up. "Good plan," she said sarcastically. "Worked great in Resident Evil."

"Got a better idea?" snapped Celina.

"Yeah, we lay low at one of our homes and inform the authorities. Hopefully there be able to set up a quarantine and send a HazMat team to get us."

"We don't have time for this," said Nelli as the reached the lobby. "Let's worry about getting to the car first. We can discuss were to go afterwards."

Celina nodded. "Alright, Nelli, you come with me. The rest of you, stay put while we go bring the car around." The two of them headed into the dark parking lot.

While Cassandra and Elizabeth stared into the darkness, Maya and Veronica sat down together on a nearby bench.

Trying to pass the time, Veronica said "Maya, I've got a question."

"Yes, Vicky?" said Maya, staring at the other girl's feet.

Wow, thought Veronica, she really must be out of it to use that stupid nickname. Nobody but her grandmother had called her that since the third grade. She asked her question anyway. "You said that the foot odor speeds up the infection in others and gives them a desire for feet." Maya nodded. "So how come you're still gaga over my feet even though they don't smell nearly bad on the floor as opposed to in the air? Our feet aren't getting bigger, but you're still obsessed."

Maya giggled. "Well, Vicky, the smell does speed up the infection and true, it does make us want each other's feet." She began rubbing her foot over Veronica's. "But the reality is that in addition to causing our feet to grow and stink, it also makes us want them feet anyway. Smelling only increases the desire and speeds it up, but it would have happened to all of us even if we didn't hadn't inhaled it."

"That still doesn't explain why your worse than the rest of us."

"Oh, that?" said Maya. "It's probably because I inhaled more of the odor than the rest of you. And I was sitting closest to you and your feet really stank, remember?" She giggled again, rubbing her foot faster on Veronica's.

"Not only that," comprehension dawning on Veronica, "you were the only one of us to actually smell a foot."

Maya stopped rubbing. "Yes. I suppose smelling directly could advance the infection at an exponential rate. You wanna try?" Maya raised her bare foot, a smile on her face.

What happens next?

Veronica stared at Maya's foot, every muscle in her body urging her to inhale its sweet, succulent scent. "Is this what I really want," she said to herself. "To have freakishly huge and smelly feet, to live my life with such a massive foot fetish?" She glanced from Maya's foot down to her own size 13 1/2 feet. Despite her doubts, she couldn't deny that the growth had made her feet so much sexier, not to mention softer and sensitive as well. And if she was being completely honest with herself, Veronica couldn't deny that thoughts of smelling, kissing, sucking, and licking feet really turned her on. She looked up and exhaled slowly, her decision made.

Leaning forward, she placed her nose on Maya's sole and took a deep breath. The effects were immediate, if surprising. There was a surge of warmth through her body, but other than that, she didn't feel any different. Oh sure, she desperately wanted to suck and kiss all of her friends' feet (especially Maya's). The thing was, it felt like something she wanted to do, not something she was compelled to do.

"Did it work?" asked Maya, interrupting Veronica's musings. "Do you wanna ravish my feet?" She covered her mouth, trying to suppress her giggling, all the while wiggling her toes in her friend's face. All the while not having a clue what her friend was thinking.

For whatever reason, Veronica still had control of herself. Maybe she had an advanced case, maybe it was because she had inhaled willingly, or maybe it was just a fluke of nature. The point was, she was still had her reasoning, ingenuity, and most of all as she scanned the room, greed. Oh, Veronica definitely wanted to "ravish" (to use Maya's word) those feet, but that was just the tip of the iceberg. She wanted more and unlike Maya, she had the tools to get it.

"Maybe later, Maya." She lowered Maya's foot to the ground and said the four most dangerous words in the English language. "I've got an idea."


* * *



Cassandra and Elizabeth were still waiting for Celina and Nelli to bring the car around when Veronica approached them. "We need to move, NOW!" she barked.

Cassandra raised an eyebrow. "Why?"

Veronica responded with a raised eyebrow of her own. "We're standing around barefoot, shoes in pieces, planning to leave the prom early and your asking why we shouldn't stand out in the open. Don't ya think that we might seem a wee bit suspicious to a passing by teacher? You wanna be the one who has to explain why our feet are now five to six sizes larger? Cause let me tell you, that's going to be the first thing anyone who comes walking by asks."

Cassandra and Elizabeth shared a look, they hadn't thought of that. The longer they stayed in the lobby, the better the odds f someone walking in on them. And considering just how far Celina had parked, they could be waiting awhile. Sensing her prey was off balanced, Veronica went for the kill. "Nor can we risk some poor girl coming by and ending up like us." Driving the point home, she raised her right, size 13 1/2 foot into the and for extra emphasis, pointed at it with both hands.

Elizabeth was trying real hard to ignore her friend's raised foot. "But if we leave, how will we know when Celina and Nelli get here? They can't exactly leave the car running to find us."

"Um, we could text...duh."

The wheels were spinning in Cassandra's head. "So we find an empty room, duck in out of sight, and tell Celina to message us when she gets here."

"Basically, yes." That was the end of that. Cassandra, Elizabeth, Veronica, and Maya left the lobby. It didn't long to find an empty office room, which the four promptly ducked inside of.

Taking out her phone, Elizabeth said "I'm gonna text Nelli and Celina. Let them know what's up." She was halfway through her text when Veronica grabbed her from behind. Her grip lost, the phone tumbled to the floor.

"Veronica, what the he-" began Cassandra as Maya tackled her to the ground. Pinning her friend down, Maya used her own legs to lock Cassandra's together. Meanwhile, Veronica forced Elizabeth to the ground, pushing her head towards Cassandra's feet.

No! No no no no! Veronica, I beg you. Stop this!" Veronica ignored Elizabeth's pleas, instead she shoved the her friend's head face first into Elizabeth's feet. So close to the source, the foot odor was intoxicating. "Elizabeth, don't do it," pleaded Cassandra as she realized what Veronica and Maya were doing. She might as well have been singing show tunes for all the good it did her.

"So....good....I can't....control myself." Elizabeth took a big whiff of Cassandra's feet and experienced the same flow of warmth that Veronica had. Smiling, Veronica released her and said "Welcome to the club, Lizzie. Glad you could join us." Elizabeth's response was to suck on Cassandra's big toe, pleasuring herself as she did.

One down, thought Veronica. However, before she could up the count, she saw that Elizabeth's phone was blinking, indicating a text. She picked up the phone and read the message.

"Where r u 4?"

Veronica smiled a wicked grin.


* * *



Celina was in a bad mood. Walking barefoot in the cold for ten minutes tended to do that. "Where are they?" She sounded like she was about to bite someone's head off. Nelli was from answering when her phone beeped. It was a reply from Elizabeth:

"Maya sick. Nelli, help. V show u."

Celina groaned. "Great, just great. I had to ask if things could get worse and low and behold, they do."

Getting out of the car, Nelli smiled. "Don't worry, I'm sure it isn't serious. Keep the car running, be back in 5." She ran into the building, the sound of her size 11 bare feet echoing into the night.

In spite of herself, Celina smirked. "One of these days, I'm going to have to find out where that girl keeps all that boundless optimism of hers. Heaven knows, I could really do with some tonight." She sat back and listened to the radio, hoping that Maya would be okay....and that what ever had happened, it wasn't because of the foot growth virus. Nelli....

Author's note: Samantha's feet (growth rate .3% a min.) Shoes: 7(9.833" )
Length: 11.64"
Time: 2:15
1552221.title: A Growing Problem

15522212.content:
After removing the remains of her shoes, Samantha wiggles her toes. She has to get home, to figure what is going on with her feet, yet she can't just barefoot it home. She looks over across the street to see a shopping center. She quickly makes her way over, nearly tripping as her growing feet are bumping into each other.

         The fronts of Samantha's socks are starting to rip as her toes are tearing through the fabric, the fronts receeding as the back if her socks are just barely covering her heels. Once she arrives, she looks between her two choices, Target and Payless Shoes, wondering which store will have shoes that fit her.


Author's note: Samantha's feet (growth rate .3% a min.)
Length: 11.89"
Time: 2:22
